name: Unnamed Puzzle Game
description:
You're Stuck in a dungeon 

Try to escape with your trusty companion - ROBO

make sure to eat cheese btw

NOTE - We're still in very early development we didn't able to finish due to some problems but we'll update this in the future <3

Controls: ControlsActionsWASDmove!Shiftsprint yoooEopen robot
and close robotclick n dragto connect wiresRdisconnect all wires
